text: Gholam Ali Haddad-Adel (, born 9 May 1945) is an Iranian philosopher, conservative and principlist politician and former chairman of the Parliament. He was the first non-cleric in the job since the Iranian Revolution of 1979. He was one of the candidates in the 2013 presidential election.حداد عادل از ادامه رقابت ها انصراف داد + بیانیه وی Iran Elect ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Iranian philosophers
title: Gholam-Ali Haddad-Adel
